hero_desc: We are official TikTok partners, our company was founded in 2023 in Tangier – Morocco, with the aim of enabling content creators to unleash their full creative potential. We work to discover, develop, and create tomorrow's stars by supporting young talents and transforming them into professionals in creative and engaging content production. With our specialized team and strategic partnerships, we strive to be the leading agency in entertainment and content production in the Middle East and North Africa region, placing innovation and quality at the heart of everything we do.

faq_subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about TikTok agency
faq_1_q: How do I open a TikTok agency?
faq_1_a: To open a TikTok agency you need: experience in content production, specialized team, marketing strategies, and partnerships with creators. We at Magic Carnation provide full support to start your agency.
faq_2_a: TikTok agents are companies that manage creator accounts, produce professional content, and develop growth strategies. Magic Carnation is one of the leading agencies in the region.
faq_3_a: Yes, TikTok is available in Morocco and is very popular. The platform is very active with millions of Moroccan users and diverse local content.
faq_4_q: How can I become a TikTok agent?
faq_4_a: To become a TikTok agent: gain experience in content, develop your marketing skills, build a network of relationships, and start managing small accounts. Join us to learn and develop.
faq_5_q: How do TikTok agencies make money?
faq_5_a: TikTok agencies earn from: creator commissions, paid content production, advertisements and sponsorships, and marketing consultations. We guarantee profitable returns for our partners.

magic_intro_p1: We are Magic Carnation, an official TikTok partner agency, founded in 2023 in Tangier – Morocco, with a clear vision to create tomorrow's stars.
magic_intro_p2: We believe that talent alone is not enough, it needs guidance, support, and a smart strategy to transform content creators into influential brands in the digital platforms world.
magic_intro_p3: Our specialized team works to discover and nurture promising talents, providing them with all the necessary tools to achieve success and growth on TikTok professionally and sustainably.
creating_stars_desc: We create the stars of the future
what_we_do_intro: At Magic Carnation, we work to empower content creators to reach their full potential through:
talent_management_desc: Discovering creators and developing their skills in streaming, content, and engagement.
support_guidance_desc: Providing professional consultations and training on TikTok algorithms and best growth methods.
brand_collaboration_desc: Connecting influencers with partnership and sponsorship opportunities.
performance_development_desc: Monitoring account performance to ensure continuous and sustainable growth.
our_goal: We aim to build a community of creators who combine creativity, passion, and professionalism, to be part of the future of digital content creation in the Arab world.
hero_desc_short: Official TikTok Partners. Founded in 2023 in Tangier – Morocco. We discover talents and transform them into stars. Full support for creative content creators. Professional team and strong partnerships. Our goal: Leadership in content production in the Middle East and North Africa.
